===Etymology===
From {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=ばっさい}} compound {{m|zh|伐採|tr=bjot tshoj<sup>X</sup>|lit=attack, strike + gather}}. More commonly encountered in modern {{etyl|cmn|-}} with the characters in the reverse order, as traditional {{m|zh|採伐}} and simplified {{m|zh|采伐|tr=cǎifá||to fell / to cut}}.
